info.title: MarketIntelligenceAPI
info.description: The Market Intelligence API provides metadata for Country Commercial Guides and other market insight reports that are produced by ITA’s trade experts. ITA commercial officers that are stationed around the world, publish these authoritative reports in conjunction with Foreign Service officers from the State Department. The API only provides the metadata and links to the reports – not the reports themselves.

get.description: The Market Intelligence API provides metadata for Country Commercial Guides and other market insight reports that are produced by ITA’s trade experts. ITA commercial officers that are stationed around the world, publish these authoritative reports in conjunction with Foreign Service officers from the State Department. The API only provides the metadata and links to the reports – not the reports themselves.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Searches for a match within the atom, references, section, summary, and title fields.  Note:  the atom field is searchable, but not returned in the JSON results.

parameters.name: industries
parameters.description: Returns articles for a specific controlled industry term. This method allows you to search for multiple industries (plural) separated by commas.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: Returns articles for a specific topic term. This method allows you to search for multiple topics (plural) separated by commas.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Returns articles for a specific country based on ISO alpha-2 country codes. This method allows you to search for multiple countries (plural) separated by commas but will only return one country (singular) per event.

parameters.name: trade_regions
parameters.description: Returns articles for a specific Trade Region.  Enter multiple values by separating with a comma.

parameters.name: world_regions
parameters.description: Returns articles for a specific World Region.  Enter multiple values by separating with a comma.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: Searches only the articles specified by the Source Abbreviation.

parameters.name: first_published_date
parameters.description: Returns articles based on their initial publish date.  Dates are filtered by comparing them against an inclusive range, which must be entered with the following format:  YYYY-mm-dd TO YYYY-mm-dd.  Searching on a single date can be done by entering the same value for the start and end of the range.

parameters.name: last_published_date
parameters.description: Returns articles based on their most recent publish date.  Dates are filtered by comparing them against an inclusive range, which must be entered with the following format:  YYYY-mm-dd TO YYYY-mm-dd.  Searching on a single date can be done by entering the same value for the start and end of the range.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the number of results to be returned up to a maximum of 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch. Unless specified the API returns 10 results at a time.

source.description: The source type of the article.

summary.description: A short summary of the article's content.

first_published_date.description: The date that the article of first published.

last_published_date.description: The article's most recent publish date.

url_name.description: A unique URL indentifier for the article.

industries.description: The ITA industry terms associated with the article.

topics.description: The ITA topic terms associated with the article.

countries.description: The countries relevant to the article.

trade_regions.description: The trade regions relevant to the article.

world_regions.description: The world regions relevant to the article.
